title: never ending data ingestion
body:
How to reproduce the behaviour
---------
Installed the newest version of doccano (1.3.1), started a sequence labelling project and tried to upload data.jsonl (from my old doccano project). After choosing a file, loading it, and clicking on the ingest button a never-ending loading page appears.

Your Environment
---------
*   Operating System: MacOS 11.3
*   Python Version Used: 3.8.5
*   How did you install doccano (Heroku button etc): pip install -U doccano
*  doccano init

WARNINGS:
api.AutoLabelingConfig: (models.W042) Auto-created primary key used when not defining a primary key type, by default 'django.db.models.AutoField'.
	HINT: Configure the DEFAULT_AUTO_FIELD setting or the ApiConfig.default_auto_field attribute to point to a subclass of AutoField, e.g. 'django.db.models.BigAutoField'.

* doccano webserver --port 8000
